<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Finish - Do final processing and write the object to the output stream.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\p Writer is used for custom object writer (as the MCJIT does),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// if not specified it is automatically created from backend.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
